mapper.select: SELECT u2.USER_NO, u2.USER_ID, u2.USER_NAME, u2.USER_NIC, u2.USER_EMAIL, u2.USER_PROFILE, a.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u2,(SELECT u.USER_NO, NVL(AVG(e.EVAL_SCORE),0) USER_SCORE FROM USERS u,EVAL e WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT re_user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND USER_NO = #{user_no} UNION SELECT user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND RE_USER_NO = #{user_no}) AND u.USER_NO = e.PUSER(+) GROUP BY u.USER_NO) a WHERE u2.USER_NO = a.USER_NO AND u2.USER_DELETE_CHK = 0

SELECT u2.USER_NO, u2.USER_ID, u2.USER_NAME, u2.USER_NIC, u2.USER_EMAIL, u2.USER_PROFILE, a.USER_SCORE FROM USERS u2,(SELECT u.USER_NO, NVL(AVG(e.EVAL_SCORE),0) USER_SCORE FROM USERS u,EVAL e WHERE u.USER_NO IN (SELECT re_user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND USER_NO = #{user_no} UNION SELECT user_no user_no FROM ADDRESS a WHERE AGREE_CHK = 1 AND RE_USER_NO = #{user_no}) AND u.USER_NO = e.PUSER(+) GROUP BY u.USER_NO) a WHERE u2.USER_NO = a.USER_NO AND u2.USER_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND u2.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{user_name} || '%'
